hebrewNER.baseline
Class BaselineNameFinder

java.lang.Object
  hebrewNER.baseline.BaselineNameFinder
public class BaselineNameFinder
extends java.lang.Object

The BaselineNameFinder tags tokens by regular expression and lexicon created from training file.
Regular expression identify date, time, momey and precent expressions.
A token gets its tag by its lexicon entry.
